TopicTitle: How do I get rid of the "Remove Data" confirmation dialog?

Articles.Content: The topic is the message, but for manners' sake: When collecting data from Goo or Science Jr. experiments, one gets a confirmation dialog. There's no "don't ask me again" checkbox. How do I get rid of that dialog?

It is pretty annoying the bazillionth time yeah.

Especially if it's a scientist doing the removing.
